title: Upgrade Your Beater Mathewson White Cap
author: jlehma13

posts.post_title: Upgrade Your Beater Mathewson White Cap
posts.post_content: This Matty is a little too pretty for me so i'd like to downgrade.  Obviously, the card is trimmed but the colors are bright and clean.  My dark cap has mold spores and my portrait has a hole through his chest.  A card somewhere in between would be nice.  Let me know what you have. - Thanks

Before he gets placed back in his cigar box, if you have a Mathewson white cap that is in worse shape than mine and want to trade, let me know.
Thanks

[quote name="jlehma13" post=1431694]Before he gets placed back in his cigar box, if you have a Mathewson white cap that is in worse shape than mine and want to trade, let me know.
Thanks[/QUOTE]

I've got an ugly one.  Let me see if I have a picture handy.
